mapper.insert: insert into FileShareURL(userId, token, fileId, shareUser) values(#{userId}, #{token}, #{fileId}, #{shareUser})
mapper.select: select * from FileShareURL where 1=1 and token = #{token} and timestampdiff(minute, expirationTime, now()) <= 4320
select * from FileShareUser where 1=1 and fileId = #{fileId}
